name: ono-sendai-bios-v094
description:
just close the weird little window that shows up at the bottom, i think that's something processingjs does and i haven't looked into turning it off

automatically updates over time, but hit enter if you want to switch a few things up.

pressing the tilde key or typing 'help' and hitting enter will throw the game into high alert.

for all those moments when you feel less like a programmer and more like a bot that stitches together all the best answers from stack overflow

at some point i will add more palettes ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
